description.narrative: The project will address the core problem of inefficient trade processes through rehabilitation and provision of modern equipment in selected border crossing points, upgrading the Customs Automated Information System and preparatory work for the establishment of a single window system.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Cost and time of compliance with trade procedures reduced

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Time and cost to cross project BCPs reduced by 30% (2014 baseline: Altanbulag BCP: 4.8 hours, $659; Bichigt BCP: 3.7 hours, $660; and Zamiin-Uud BCP: 8.7 hours, $383)
